taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section setosi;species angustifoliatus;

treatment.description: Primocanes densely beset with short recurved prickles, bristles and stipitate glands; the prickly- and glandular-petioled leaf with 5petiolulate lance-attenuate leaflets; upper leaflets barely half as broad as long; inflorescence loosely racemose, the ascending glandular pedicels mostly subtended by 3-foliolate or simple bracts resembling the foliage-leaves.
